page.title: 20The Survey Team-Spennymoor
page.content:
We would have liked to have shown all our names on this page but there simply isn't room. We will therefore put our year groups and our school.
The children, parents and teachers of: { ROSA STREET JMI SCHOOL (4th Year) Spennymoor { KING STREET JM SCHOOL (4th Year) Spennymoor { MIDDLESTONE MOOR JM SCHOOL (2nd, 3rd Middlestone Moor { & 4th Years)
We would like to thank all the people who were interviewed and those who invited us into their homes. We have enjoyed the work and learned a great deal more than can ever be represented in 20 pages of text. Thank you for presenting us with this opportunity.
